modName: AEOR - Arrow and Explosive Ordnance Repository
summary: Contains new arrows and explosives for your general mayhem.
descriptionHtml:
[center][heading][size=10]Arrow and Explosive Ordnance Repository[/size][/heading]
(Realistic rudimentary utility arrows and explosives)

[color=cyan]Arrow Types[/color]

Flame Arrow
Craftable by all, this arrow will create a light source lasting 30 seconds before burning out, or burn your foes by shooting it at them!

[color=yellow]NEW![/color] Striker Mini-crossbow
When we say mini we mean single-shot hidden wrist style mini.  This little lady deals straight up poison damage, and if you hit in the right spot you might just kill someone right out!  Damage scales with Overdraw, Poisoners get bonus damage!

Stinger Mini-crossbow
Requiring 1/5 Overdraw OR Poisoner, a single-shot hidden wrist bow, this tiny baby fires a compact bolt that deals long lasting poison damage!  Poisoners get bonus damage!

Flash Arrow
Requires 2/5 Overdraw OR Alchemist, this arrow will create a flash on impact, doing no damage but causing nearby targets to lose focus on you!

Gas Arrow
Requires 3/5 Overdraw OR Alchemist, this arrow will poison everything in a moderate radius on impact!

Dwarven Fire Arrow
Requires 3/5 Overdraw OR Alchemist, this arrow gives explosive results, has a smaller radius but causes more mayhem!

[color=cyan]Explosive Ordnance[/color]

Fire Bomb Satchel
Requiring 4/5 Overdraw OR Alchemist, this bad boy comes preloaded with 3 Dwarven Fire Bombs for your personal use!  Perfect for that explosive entrance.

Snare Trap
Requires 1/5 Overdraw OR Steelsmithing, may not be explosive, but lays a trap on the ground guaranteed* to stop anything in its tracks![/center]

[color=cyan]SPECIAL OFFER![/color] Order now and receive free increased arrow flight time!  That\'s right, your arrows will all fly longer, farther, and stronger with our improved aerodynamics.  You\'ll be able to shoot straight up and actually have your arrow fall back down on you!


Disclaimer: All instruments of death can be made at a forge under Misc.  Use at own risk.  Company is not liable for dismemberment.  [b][u]Currently contains no special models since I haven\'t learned any modeling yet[/b][/u], this is first and foremost a proof of concept.  Don\'t bother asking for me to change the satchel to something either then charges, because I\'d love to but still have to learn scripting.  This is my first real mod after all.  Charge time on satchel is there for anti-spamming reasons, plus realism as you have to get it out and light it.

*We do not actually guarantee this.

Actual patch notes will be kept in the change log.
author: Palderon
